content.title: AirCannon Project Complete & What’s Next! 🚀
content.creator:
Magpie Tech
March 3, 2025
content.content:
Hello Magpie Backers!
The AirCannon campaign has officially wrapped up—successfully! 🎉
We’re beyond grateful for your amazing support and enthusiasm throughout this journey. From the very beginning of Magpie to where we are today, it’s all thanks to you. 💙
Now, let’s dive into some exciting updates about AirCannon and the upcoming shipping schedule!
🔥 AirCannon Power Test Video is Here!

We thought we had explained AirCannon’s power well, but we noticed that many of you still had questions—especially about CFM and MPH values. So, we ran actual tests and recorded a video for you! 📹 We can’t wait for you to check it out. Hope you love the results!
🚚 Shipping Timeline
We’re doing everything we can to get your AirCannon to you as fast as possible!
📍 Mid-to-late March: We’ll send out the shipping survey via the email you registered on Kickstarter.
📍 April - May: Once the surveys are completed, we’ll finalize the quantities and begin mass production.
📍 June - July: AirCannon will finally land in your hands! 🚀
Just a little more patience—we’re almost there! Thank you again for being part of this journey. We’ll keep you updated every step of the way!
💙 With gratitude,
The Magpie Team

comments.text: I am a supporter or the AirCannon and hoping you can share information about the anemometer that was used in the latest video. I have spent hours trying to find a meter that will register over 100mph like yours but with no success. Thank you, Ed

Hello Ed, Thank you for supporting our AirCannon project. Since we purchased the product from South Korea, we cannot be certain whether the same model is available in your country. In fact, our team also had faced the same difficulty as you did, since most of the anemometers could only indicate up to 100 mph. We believe that contacting local experts in your region may be the fastest way to confirm availability of similar unit. We’re truly sorry that we couldn’t be of more help, but we appreciate your understanding. Please feel free to reach out if there’s anything else we can assist you with! Best regards, Magpie Team
I’m just blown over by this update.

Hello Raymond, Thank you for supporting our AirCannon project. Haha! 🤣 That was a good one! We sincerely hope that AirCannon will be a great tool for all of our backers. 🍃 Enjoy the storm in your hand once you receive your reward! Best regards, Magpie Team

270 CFM on Turbo is very impressive for the size. Is it possible to just turn on your video and do a turbo continuous run and show that you actually can sustain turbo for 25 minutes as claimed? Even 10 minutes sustained would be persuasive. I would expect aa slight decline over the span but even that would be impressive. Some leaf blowers have huge decline in the first minute. Thanks.

Hello Creative, First and foremost, we sincerely appreciate your continued support for AirCannon! Despite any concerns you may have had, your trust and encouragement have been invaluable in ensuring the smooth progress of this project. Regarding Turbo Mode, we sincerely apologize for any confusion. It appears that you may have been referring to an old incorrect comment previously provided by a former customer service representative. While we did issue a correction in the comment section, we would like to clarify once again that Turbo Mode is designed to operate for approximately 12 seconds before automatically shutting off to prevent potential product overload. However, all other modes remain continuously operational! Before developing AirCannon, our team purchased and tested several air blowers from well-known competitors. Our tests revealed that, contrary to their stated specifications, all of them experienced a decline in airflow power within seconds including Turbo Mode. In contrast, AirCannon maintains its maximum power consistently, ensuring superior performance. Thank you very much for your support! Best Regards, Magpie Team

Well done all for this immense success.... a tiny question on how are you intending to ship the inits with the batteries to Europe with all the red tape airlines are putting everyone through? Thanks Mel..

Hello Melvin, First of all, tremendously thank you for supporting our AirCannon project! Our team is actively seeking the safest and most cost-effective shipping partners to provide the best possible shipment solution for all our backers. In the event of any customs-related issues, we will be immediately notified and will take prompt action to assist such situation, whether by contacting them directly or facilitating the necessary customs clearance procedures. Additionally, once the shipping partner is confirmed and shipments begin, we will provide another update to notify all backers. Please rest assured that we are committed to ensuring a smooth delivery process! Best Regards, Magpie Team

content.title: 🎯 We Did It! 100% Funded in 5 Minutes!
content.creator:
Magpie Tech
January 6, 2025
content.content:
🎉Hello, Magpie Backers!🎉
First of all, I want to sincerely thank you for being a part of our project. It’s because of your support that we were able to get this project off the ground. We are truly grateful!
🚀 [100% Goal Achieved in 5 Minutes!]
Thanks to all of you, we were able to reach our goal in no time! To achieve the funding goal in just 5 minutes is truly the moment we’ve been hoping for. Your interest and love have been a huge help. We sincerely thank you, and we will continue to strive to bring you more great news!
💨 [Performance Revealed!] AirCannon Spec Test
The time has come to show you the powerful performance of the AirCannon that you’ve been eagerly waiting for! We’re sharing the actual test scenes of the specifications introduced in our Kickstarter product story. You’ll be able to see for yourself just how powerful the AirCannon is. 
1.Wind Speed Test🌪
The measurement unit is km/h
We used a professional anemometer to measure the wind speed generated by the AirCannon. The result was over 124mph (200km/h). It’s incredibly powerful, right?
2.Wind Strength Test💪
The measurement unit is gram
To accurately measure the strength of the wind, we directed it at a precision scale and converted the wind force into weight. The result was an impressive 1.3kg (2.8lb) of wind. Once you experience this powerful wind firsthand, you’ll understand how amazing it is.
🎁 [Unlock the $100,000 Stretch Goal!]-Special Gift Incoming!
Here’s even more exciting news! We’ve prepared a special stretch goal for this project. If the total funding reaches $100,000, we’ll give all backers a special gift as a thank-you! What the gift will be will be revealed once the goal is achieved. So, please let your friends know and join in! The more people who join, the sooner we’ll reach the goal!
Once again, thank you so much for your support! If you have any questions, feel free to reach out to us anytime at info@magpie-tech.com. We promise to be creators who always put our backers first.

comments.text: Hello Ivan, Thank you for supporting our AirCannon project. Since there are still about 11 days left in the project funding period, shipments will be processed sequentially for those who have completed the survey, after the funding period ends. We will begin the process as quickly as possible as soon as the project is finalized, so we kindly ask for a little more patience and understanding! Thank you once again for your support! Best Regards, Magpie Team
Looks like the stretch has been achieved??/

That's right! The stretch goal has been unlocked! 🎉 Check out the very top of the project story for details. The stretch goal reward is a protective mesh designed to prevent foreign objects from entering the back of the Air Cannon — because safety always comes first, right? 😉
Great. Since that's the case, you can start production tomorrow.

Hahaha, we can’t wait to start production either! 😆 But it will officially begin after the campaign ends. In the meantime, we’ll keep making minor product updates and improvements. We'll make sure to keep sharing progress along the way! 🚀
